job_tasks.phrase: Define solution architecture and contribute to determining our enterprise architecture
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to understanding the broader business context and aligning technical solutions with strategic architectural decisions.

job_tasks.phrase: Solutioning and development of both simple and more complex GenAI-driven applications, both low code and high code
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions the development of GenAI applications, which falls under building software systems.

job_tasks.phrase: design, build, and manage Azure Cloud solutions
job_tasks.justification: Building and managing cloud solutions is a core part of software development and infrastructure management for applications.
This indicates understanding the business needs and translating them into technical tasks.
The core of the role involves working with GenAI, which implies modeling and leveraging generative techniques.

job_tasks.phrase: manage Azure Cloud solutions, ensuring performance and cost transparency
job_tasks.justification: Managing cloud solutions for performance and cost transparency touches upon operational aspects of deployed systems.

soft_skills.phrase: Stay abreast of the latest trends in GenAI and MS Azure Cloud to drive innovation

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes designing and developing GenAI-driven applications and leveraging GenAI technologies. It explicitly mentions 'GenAI-driven applications' and staying abreast of 'GenAI trends,' aligning directly with the core definition of a GenAI Engineer.
